utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Hi, I'm Jessica. I work in the marketing department.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Nice to meet you, Jessica. I'm Thompson from engineering.

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Great to meet you, Thompson. How long have you been with the company?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: About three years now, Jessica. What about you?

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: Just started last month! Thompson, can you tell me about your current project?

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: Sure, Jessica. We're working on a new mobile app for our customers.

utterances.speaker: A
utterances.text: That sounds exciting, Thompson! I'd love to help with the marketing campaign.

utterances.speaker: B
utterances.text: That would be great, Jessica. Let's set up a meeting next week.
